name: Single METAL Watchband Bracelet
description:
These bracelets are perfect for stacking for some arm candy, or can be worn on their own. They are made with vintage stretchy watchbands and recycled with etc...'s signature wire work for an easy wearable look. Watchbands have stainless steel backing and is made with either gold or silver plated tarnish-free wire. 

Please care for your bracelet, do not get wet, and polish with a polish cloth for longer wear. 

*PLEASE SPECIFY WHAT COLOR, METAL WIRE (GOLD/SILVER), AND SIZE (THIN/WIDE/XL for Men) AND ANY STYLE PREFERENCES WHEN ORDERING* and allow up to 2 weeks for delivery. All items are one-of-a-kind.

name: Watchband Classic Cuff Bracelet
description:
This statement bracelet looks like you created your own layered arm candy look with one bracelet. It is made from 4 various sized vintage watchbands with stainless steel backings, recycled into a cuff bracelet, and with gold or silver plated tarnish-free wire in etc...'s signature closure. 

Do not get wet and if wire dulls due to wear/water, use a polish cloth. Please allow up to 2 weeks for delivery. All items are one-of-a-kind.

name: Single NEON Watchband Bracelet ORIG $35
description:
These bracelets are perfect for stacking for some arm candy, or can be worn on their own. They are made with vintage stretchy watchbands and recycled with etc...'s signature wire work for an easy wearable look. Watchbands have stainless steel backing and is made with either gold or silver plated tarnish-free wire. 

Neon bracelets are painted with special metal paint that is water resistant. Please care for your bracelet, do not get wet, and polish with a polish cloth for longer wear. 

Neon bracelets currently available in:
*pink
*orange
*yellow
*green

*PLEASE SPECIFY WHAT COLOR, METAL WIRE (GOLD/SILVER), AND SIZE (THIN/WIDE/XL for Men) WHEN ORDERING* and allow up to 2 weeks for delivery. All items are one-of-a-kind.

name: Watchband Braided Cuff Bracelet in Silver
description:
This statement bracelet looks great worn alone or stacked with others. It is made from thin vintage watchbands with stainless steel backings, recycled into a cuff bracelet, and with silver plated tarnish-free wire in etc...'s signature closure. With extra links, this bracelet is one size fits most.

Do not get wet and if wire dulls due to wear/water, use a polish cloth. Please allow up to 2 weeks for delivery. All items are one-of-a-kind.

name: Watchband Braided Cuff Bracelet in Gold
description:
This statement bracelet looks great worn alone or stacked with others. It is made from wide vintage watchbands with stainless steel backings, recycled into a cuff bracelet, and with gold plated tarnish-free wire in etc...'s signature closure. With extra links, this bracelet is one size fits most.

Do not get wet and if wire dulls due to wear/water, use a polish cloth. Please allow up to 2 weeks for delivery. All items are one-of-a-kind.
